creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait (bijin-ga), mica on kimono; head and torso of woman in profile from PL, arranging her hair, looking in a mirror with pocket for combs, in her PL hand; blue floral kimono
marks: 昭和六年一月元旦 {Shōwa rokunen ichigatsu gantan} (January 深水畫 {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Hand Mirror
